item.title: About
item.description:
Hi. I am a C and C++ developer and freelancer. I worked on MMORPG game mods for many years. My skills are reverse engineering, Windows internals, Windows kernel development, OS development, and game security. I also use JavaScript. I enjoy game engines, optimization.

If you want to talk or ask about your project you can write to me:

Email: eraycodes@proton.me
Discord: abakidev
